name: Hydraulik
overview: Hydraulik is a Pipe Dream clone. The player's task is to close the water cycle by stacking pipes in the right way before the time runs out. For each part of properly laid pipe player receives points. The pipes appear in random order, shown on the left side of the screen. There are a few different types of pipes: straight lines going horizontally or vertically, rotating corners and crossover ones. All of them may be rotated in all directions.
